item.description:
THE IRA'S SINGLES EVENTS PRESENTS:



A Fun Filled Evening of



Social Mingling, Food Sharing, and best of all



A chance to answer the age old question of?



Who are better drivers? Man or Women?



Let’s find out at: On Track Karting.



Who has the Speed,Control,Agility,and Courage to drive these High Performance Sodi Karts?









DETAILS BELOW:





Date: Friday, August 20, 7:00 P.M.- 10:00 P.M. After 10:00, new location for Cocktails. TBD exact location.



Time: Start time: 7:00 P.M. Light nosh and Mingling. 7:45ish- First Race. 8:45ish Second Race.



Food/Social Info: We have our own exclusive Event Room. Please bring an appetizer or dessert to share. ( No Alcohol. No DWI at this event. !! Name tags and introductions for all. ( Ladies- There certainly will me a lot of man at this event, please do join, and race with us)



Capacity: 50 Single Drivers. We will have races between the man and women. A prize for the best racer in heat one and two will be given by The Ira.



Cost: $30.50 . This includes not one, but two races. How fun? Social Mingling at it’s best. An evening of entertainment.



R.S.V.P. Please send to me your email address for Pay Pay Information. Prepaid on or before, August 15-$ 30.50 . After this day, $35.00. Day of event. $40.00. First come, First Served . Send info to: mistrchrming@aol.com. Subject Line- Kart Racing



Additional Information: http://www.ontrackkar...



On Track Karting
984 N Colony Rd (Rt 5)
Wallingford CT 06492

info@ontrackkarting.com
(203) 626-0464









On Track Karting operates a 63,000-square-foot indoor karting facility located in Wallingford, CT. With a 1,700 ft track, and a fleet of 40 mph-high performance Sodi Karts, it is one of the longest and most competitive indoor racing facilities in the country. Our 8,000-square-foot build-out includes several viewing areas to watch the action, corporate meeting rooms, a lounge with leather couches and a big-screen TV, an arcade, an event room that can accommodate groups of up to 48 people and our newest addition-- the Grand Prix Grill, so come on down and check us out.



On Track Karting offers arrive and drive racing for both adults (ages 16 and up with valid driver's license or learner's permit) and juniors (ages 8 - 15). All required safety equipment and instruction are provided to all racers. ***IMPORTANT NOTE: All racers must have a signed waiver to run. Anyone under 18 must have a waiver signed by their parents. Waivers are downloadable from the racing page above.
item.name: The Ira- High Performance Sodi Kart Racing with Social Hours for Mingling
